title: Figure skating at the 1948 Winter Olympics – Pairs
text:
The <a href="pair%20skating">pair skating</a> event was held as part of the <a href="figure%20skating%20at%20the%201948%20Winter%20Olympics">figure skating at the 1948 Winter Olympics</a>. It was the seventh appearance of the event, which had previously been held twice at the Summer Olympics in 1908 and 1920 and at all four Winter Games from 1924 onward. The competition was held on 7 February 1948. Thirty figure skaters from eleven nations competed.
Results.
